finalProject.collaboration: Master Thesis: Colaboration with Volkswagen Group, Germany
finalProject.description: Investigate and write a research paper on technological countermeasures for drivers passive fatique.

finalProject.collaboration: Final Project: Colaboration with Treat Systems A/S, Denmark
finalProject.description: Design the main product Treat Essential accross multiple platforms. The architecture must handle massive amounts of data, while granting large scale concept, that is fully testable and maintainable over time.

finalProject.collaboration: Final Project: Colaboration with Betfray A/S, Denmark
finalProject.description: Design and implementation of a new module for a social-betting platform, consisting in 1-vs-1 challenges and many-to-many competitions rewarded by real-world prizes, determined by the company's sponsors.
